channel.title: Aws on siddythings
channel.description: Recent content in Aws on siddythings

item.title: What is a Dead Letter Queue (DLQ)?
item.description: A Dead-Letter Queue (DLQ) is like a message timeout corner in a software system.

item.title: Background Tasks in Lambda Using SQS
item.description: In the world of serverless computing, AWS Lambda has become a popular choice for executing code without the need for provisioning or managing servers. One of the key features of AWS Lambda is its ability to run functions in response to various events.
